description:
The component creates a message in the lower-left corner of the screen.

You can set the how long the message will be active, the delay before displaying it, and the background color.
properties.payload.properties.delay.desc: The duration of the delay (in milliseconds) before the message appears.
properties.payload.properties.duration.d:
The duration of the message activity (in milliseconds), which includes the duration of the delay before displaying it.

For example, if `duration` is 1000 and `delay` is 400, the message will be displayed for 600 milliseconds.
properties.payload.properties.theme.desc:
The background color of the message: 

* `info` — blue.
* `success` — green.
* `warning` — yellow.
* `danger` — red.
